name: Pixel Gun Battle
description:
Pixel Gun Battle - Top Down Shooter by Yaroslav Kovalev.

Brutal like Brutal Doom and beuty like Hotline Miami. Just go ahead and shoot anything that moves.

THE MISSION

Destroy all opponents on the level and stay alive.

You will have to think over your moves in order to properly manage your lives.

GUNS

Firearm - You pick up one gun at a time.

MAIN FEATURES

- Cool controls;

- Bright, juicy graphics, pixel art;

- Continuous chaos, shooting and effects;

- Gorgeous sound;

- Tons of enemies.

- Definitely the best HL Miami style Top Down Shooter.

No time to think - go ahead!

For all questions, please contact: spectr.presents@gmail.com
